column5: A friend of mine and his wife will moving to Owen Sound this month to start new jobs in Sept and need to find a place to live. They are looking to rent and I know there are some people on here from the area so any help would be appreciated.
Heres a link to help the cause   http://www.ontariopls.com/property/greybruce/   good Luck ...welcome to the area and remember your fishing gear when you visit your friends..
thanks I will pass on the link!!!
